Name: Legend of the Skyfish
About the game: Legend of the Skyfish is a beautiful level-based adventure puzzler with a unique weapon and tool - a fishing pole! Follow the intrepid Little Red Hook on her journey with the Moonwhale to defeat the monstrous Skyfish. Use your fishing pole as a weapon or a grappling hook, and upgrade it as you go. Legend of the Skyfish is filled with beautiful hand-painted art, intricate action puzzles and unique enemies. Explore a huge world of 45 handcrafted levels and defeat giant bosses. Features: - Unique fishing/grappling hook mechanics - Gorgeous hand-painted environments and creatures - Original music score by Sean Beeson - 45 handcrafted levels - Epic boss fights - Many items to find and use - Various puzzles to solve - Great for all ages! And also: - Controller Support
